0000000110111100 0011100101110100 0 -> sum: 0011101100110000, cout: 0
1000110100001100 1101110000000010 0 -> sum: 0110100100001110, cout: 1
1010001000100000 0100110010000011 1 -> sum: 1110111010100100, cout: 0
0010111110111000 0101101001011100 0 -> sum: 1000101000010100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
